title: What is TrailRider
description:
Local staff will provide expert advice on the best routes for chairs, so with the help of chair operators you can experience Victoriaâ€™s parks like never before.
A minimum of two chair operators are required to operate the chair.
list: TrailRider is a program enabling visitors with mobility limitations to probe the spectacular outdoor sceneries

title: Voluntary Carers
list: To book a TrailRider Volunteer please contact the Parks Victoria Volunteer Officer:

title: How to Use
description:
Service is free to use.
Bring helmet and undertake a chair induction.
Have seat belt fastened.
When stationary, ensure the chair is on ground level, the kickstand is down and is stabilised by at least one operator.
list: To book a TrailRider Volunteer please contact the Volunteer Officer of the park. Moreover:
